minimalistic.title: Minimalistic Template
minimalistic.description: For those who prefer a clean and simple design.

professional.title: Professional Template
professional.description: For those who like it basic & professional.

inputDetails.title: Input your details
inputDetails.description: Enter your professional information and experience with our user-friendly interface.

aiOptimization.title: AI Optimization
aiOptimization.description: Our advanced AI analyzes and enhances your resume content for maximum impact.

downloadAndApply.title: Download & Apply
downloadAndApply.description: Get your polished, ATS optimized, professional resume instantly and start applying to jobs.

isDataSecure.title: Is my data secure?
isDataSecure.description: Yes, we value your privacy and ensure the security of your data. Your information is protected at all times. We work with third-party services like ChatGPT and Supabase to ensure the highest level of data safety and security.

howDoesAiWork.title: How does the AI work?
howDoesAiWork.description: We send your information to ChatGPT, a powerful language model, to analyze and enhance your resume. This AI-generated content is then optimized for ATS platforms and tailored to the job you're applying to. We make sure to not generate or inflate any information. We believe in keeping your resume authentic and honest. We only enhance what you've already written.

howToSignup.title: How do I sign up?
howToSignup.description: You can sign up by clicking the "Create Your Resume" button above or the "Sign In" button in the top right corner. Currently we support Google Sign In.

signin.title: Sign in to resugenie.
signin.description: To use resugenie, you'll have to sign in first
signin.alreadyRegistered: An account with this email address already exists. Did you log in using a different provider last time?

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your resume.

jobAdvertisement.title: Job Advertisement
jobAdvertisement.description: Copy the Job Advertisement Text in here to get started
